snippet: A decade after the celebrated introduction of the European currency, the word “euro” in a headline is usually paired with the word “crisis.”
abstract: Ten year anniversary of the euro passes with little fanfare, as 12 nations which share common currency continue to grapple with economic crisis.

byline.contributor: Scott Sayare and Doreen Carvajal contributed reporting from Paris, and Elisabetta Povoledo from Rome.

lead_paragraph: A decade after the celebrated introduction of the European currency, the word “euro” in a headline is usually paired with the word “crisis.”

headline.seo: Euro Has 10-Year Anniversary, but Few Are Celebrating
headline.main: No Fireworks for Euro as It Reaches the 10-Year Mark
headline.print_headline: Euro, Introduced With Flourish, Gets Little Celebration at Its 10-Year Mark
